titleStmt.title: Tabula
Chronicles of England.
titleStmt.author: Higden, Ranulf, d. 1364. Polycronicon. English. Selections.
Trevisa, Johncd. 1402.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Enprynted by one some tyme scole mayster of saynt Albons, vppon whoos soule god haue mercy. Amen. And newely in the yere of our lorde god. M.CCCCC.ii. Enprynted in fleete strete in [the] sygne of the sone. By me Wynkyn de Worde,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date from colophon.
Heading, 2a2r: Here begynneth a short [and] a breue table on these Cronycles, .. .
In two parts, each with separate register; part 2 reprints STC 13440b: Higden, Ranulf. "The descrypcyon of Englonde" (selections, translated by John Trevisa, from "Polycronicon").
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
